stories.text:
I don't mean working at Meta, more curious if someone who's online right now is building new social apps.

The term "social app" is pretty vague, I want to get an understanding of what it means to those of you who are building new social apps. What is your niche, and what led you there?
stories.title: Anyone here build social apps?

stories.title: How to check bad pronunciation highlight like Elsa?
